page.title: 04Our Visit To Jaguar
page.content: On Monday the 8th of July we went to the Jaguar car factory. When we got there Mr. Robottom welcomed us and told us a bit about the history of the company. We watched a film showing how the cars are made. Then a student showed us around the training department. We had to wear goggles when we went into the different sorts of rooms because we had to protect our eyes. We went downstairs to the 6O shop to see the robots. The factory was big and smelled of glue and oil. There was a noise of machines all the time. Jaguar cars are sometimes called Big Cats after their symbol, a leaping Jaguar.
